name: Toy Tank Shooting
description:
This game is for windows only.

It is created for learning Unreal Engine 4.

It is a run game where you have to move a toy tank forward.

If you pick up a bullet, it will fire a shot for a certain period of time.

If you break a pillar to get a power-up item or jump on a block to get an item, one of the following effects will appear: speed up, horizontal movement, or shorten the time between shots.

Post your high score on Twitter!

Contact us at https://twitter.com/HirokichiG

Translated with www.DeepL.com/Translator (free version)

[Game Engine]
Unreal Engine
https://www.unrealengine.com/

[Modeling]

https://www.blender.org/
